description:
New ultralight shorts with the famous Swift running name. These are made with a stretch woven
fabric and a built-in Echo brief liner, complete with a secure zip back pocket and breathable
jacquard waistband for light and fast trail days – running, hiking, backpacking, and beyond.
name: Outdoor Research Swift Lite Shorts, 5" Inseam - Mens

specs.key: Bluesign® approved 88% Polyester, 12% Spandex Echo Liner
